articles.description: After scoring four brilliant goals for Chelsea in their 6-0 win over Everton on Monday, can the Blues' Cole Palmer win the golden boot?
articles.title: 'Amazing' Palmer produces again but can he really win Golden Boot?

articles.description: Paris will welcome the world this summer, but France's distinctive relationship with religion means its own Olympic athletes will have a different dress code.
articles.title: Paris 2024: The controversial hijab ban at sport's biggest party

articles.description: Former England and Kent bowler Derek Underwood dies at the age of 78, the county announces.
articles.title: England and Kent spinner Underwood dies aged 78

articles.description: Scottie Scheffler confirmed himself as the best golfer on the planet with Sunday's Masters victory but Ludvig Aberg's performance should not go unnoticed, writes Iain Carter.
articles.title: Masters 2024: Scottie Scheffler's win at Augusta and Ludvig Aberg's runner-up to be cherished

articles.description: Chelsea boss Mauricio Pochettino says he was "so upset" about the dispute over who would take the penalty in their 6-0 win over Everton and warns his players not to do it again.
articles.title: Pochettino 'can't accept' Chelsea penalty squabble

articles.description: Which players impressed our football pundit Garth Crooks enough to make his latest Team of the Week?
articles.title: Who gave their heart and soul? Garth Crooks' Team of the Week

articles.description: Sunrisers Hyderabad break the record for the highest Indian Premier League total for the second time this season by posting 287-3.
articles.title: Spectacular Sunrisers set another IPL record score

articles.description: Dele Alli says he "can see the light at the end of the tunnel" and is targeting playing at the 2026 World Cup with England.
articles.title: Dele sees 'light at end of tunnel' and targets World Cup

articles.description: Heavyweight Deontay Wilder has signed with Matchroom Boxing and will face Zhilei Zhang as part of the five-versus-five card against Queensberry Promotions in June
articles.title: Deontay Wilder will face Zhilei Zhang on 1 June after making shock move to Matchroom

articles.description: Rafael Nadal says he is "just trying to enjoy every moment" as he returns to the tour for the first time since January.
articles.title: Rafael Nadal confirms appearance at Barcelona Open but suggest 2024 will be his last on tour
